verses.name: 2 Samuel 5:15
verses.text: Ibhar also, and Elishua, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

verses.name: 2 Samuel 5:16
verses.text: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphalet.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 5:17
verses.text: But when the Philistines heard that they had anointed David king over Israel, all the Philistines came up to seek David; and David heard of it, and went down to the hold.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 5:18
verses.text: The Philistines also came and spread themselves in the valley of Rephaim.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 5:19
verses.text: And David enquired of the Lord, saying, Shall I go up to the Philistines? wilt thou deliver them into mine hand? And the Lord said unto David, Go up: for I will doubtless deliver the Philistines into thine hand.
